title: I choose to believe that Solo Queue will return one day

best way to do it guys is to quit league for 1 month all players that want it back and then riot will wake up i quess where 80% or less make a revolution i lost 10 games in a row because of the dinamic and "smart" rito made us see theyre team name ingame and after i just needed 1s to see ho was preamde at the end of the game ,the jungler that always ganks my lane ,the duo/trio somethimes all 4 that flames me because i died ,the faker mid that seems unstopable ,the lvl 1 gangbang i litteraly deleted lol after i played undertale there are so many fun games and lol lost his it has became more competitive one mistake can cost u the game

Dynamic Queue is ~~bad~~ good.
GET THE HENCE SATAN

Why do all of you unranked boosted animals want solo Q back? You lose a few games in a row and go to the forums and complain? Dynamic Q is not your problem, you're getting the role you want. Quit making excuses for your poor play.

> [{quoted}](name=Andus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=AMRtYIdn,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-07-06T15:53:01.417+0000)
>
> Why do all of you unranked boosted animals want solo Q back? You lose a few games in a row and go to the forums and complain? Dynamic Q is not your problem, you're getting the role you want. Quit making excuses for your poor play.

dynamic q is not the new champ select
Dynamic queue =/= The new champion select. The premades are the only problem.
Premade bronze is still bronze. Putting 4 of them together does not make them better.

It doesn't make them better no, but they are most likely skyping and will have 10x the communication of 5 solos.

Not to mention playing on the same team as a premade just to be berated and have your lane ignored.
They did A stat check for how much solo q players and dq players were winning and the only Elos with any form of difference was plat and above.  Plat was even 53-47 so it wasn't that bad.   P

A guy made a post on the boards a while back tracking DQ games of masters and above.

A 5 man vs 5 solos in master and challenger gave the premade an 80% winrate and a 4 man premade plus a solo vs 5 solos was I believe a 65% winrate.

DQ doesnt work.

> DQ doesnt work. 


I NEVER SAID THAT IT DID DON'T PUT WORDS IN MAH MOUTH TYVM

I never put words in your mouth, I stated DQ doesn't work.

Chill.
I'm pretty sure bronze skype communication would be like "I'm coming bot now" which could simply be pinged with the rest flaming.

Well, would you look at that

Here we have a rare species that not only still thinks New Champ Select and DQ are the same thing, also fail to recognize that this post is in MEMES AND GAMES. MEMES AND GAMES! HELLO? ANYONE AWAKE IN THAT BRAIN OF YOURS?

Fish you disappoint me.

Here I thought you wanted to keep the DynQ/SoloQ threads OFF of M&G
https://storage.googleapis.com/vidsums/dc163de7-d86b-4285-a655-a322ec903021_text.gif
I don't know why you would want SoloQ, given that you can't climb without a group carrying your **_HEAVY_** weight
I'll have you know that I climbed out of Bronze alone. Granted, I abused the fact that Udyr was OP as hell (and stopped climbing when he was nerfed), but still.
Stop fucking farming upvotes, holy shit.

I believe one day solo queue will be back and it will legit be solo queue not duo queue!
Here's what will happen!
Step 1: wake up from dreaming!
Step 2: open up league and Rito learn their mistake and brings back solo mode!
Step 3: I'll be able to climb in league again!

Step 1 and 3 needs to be swapped!
sigh
If there is people who still believe in Santa Claus, the tooth fairy and God, then I see no reason why you shouldn't believe in anything you wish :)
